events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their sedan and a utility pole during heavy rain.
The claim was classified under the Auto Accident cluster based on the description of the vehicle collision.
Claims agent Jennifer Parker has been assigned to manage the customer’s auto accident case.
Acknowledgement sent to customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps.
Customer was asked to submit photos of the vehicle damage and police accident report for processing.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including police report, repair estimates, and photos.
Claims team initiated detailed investigation to verify accident details and damage assessments.
Completed investigation confirmed circumstances of the auto collision and verified liability.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repairs and loss of use was proposed to the customer.
Customer responded with acceptance of the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with handling.
The auto accident claim was officially approved for payout following customer confirmation.
Payment was issued promptly to the customer’s account to cover approved vehicle repairs.
Claim successfully closed after resolution and confirmation with customer of payment receipt.
Final case documents and correspondence archived in the system for future reference.
